title: Unable to buy from the Snowdown Shop
body: I was so excited to see challenger Ahri in my shop but every time I try to purchase her it always say an error has occured, I have the money to buy herHas this happened to anyone else.  Please Riot can you help?

replies.body:
Hey Exalted Lucina,

I'll do my best to help, but I'll need a bit more information from you. What error are you receiving? Can you provide a screenshot? 

Thanks!

UPDATE: At this time, you're advised to submit a ticket to Riot Games Player Support so that they can assist you further. You can do that on the Riot Games Support website at: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

Thanks you helping but how do I put a screenshot onto here?
OMG Thankyou so much <3

Ah, I no longer need the screenshot, as there were a few other Summoners encountering this issue as well. You should, however, submit this information in a ticket, and hopefully they'll be able to assist you.
Thankyou for all you help C: I have Submited a Ticket too
